about.label: About Us
about.title: We build digital solutions that help businesses grow
about.p1: Welcome to Diphant, a digital agency focused on creating effective and reliable digital solutions for modern businesses.
about.p2: We combine strategy, design, and technology to help you build a strong online presence and attract the right customers.
about.p3: Our goal is simple: create websites, applications, and digital strategies that deliver real results.

ceo.description: With over 4 years of experience in web development, mobile applications, and digital marketing strategies, Alzaibak Mohamad holds a Bachelor's degree in Digital Solutions Design and Development from HETIC. I founded Diphant to make digital technologies accessible and effective for all businesses.
ceo.quote: Technology should make business easier. At Diphant, we create simple, powerful, and effective digital solutions that help companies succeed.
